caption.p: Detection of potential recombination events of NG/17â€“0500 within HEV-1 to HEV-4. a Identity Plot and b BootScan analyses of full-length sequences were performed using SimPlot software program version 3.5.1 with an F84 distance model, a sliding window size of 300 base pairs and a step size of 15 base pairs increment. Positions containing gaps were stripped from the alignment
